subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Blake Griffin, the top pick in last year’s N.B.A. draft, will have surgery on his broken left kneecap, keeping him out for at least four more months, the Los Angeles Clippers announced Wednesday.
snippet: Blake Griffin, the top pick in last year’s N.B.A. draft, will have surgery on his broken left kneecap, keeping him out for at least four more months, the Los Angeles Clippers announced Wednesday.
